synopsis.text: Period, where historical figures from Japan's feudal era are reimagined as charming young men. Caught in a whirlwind of unexpected events, Sasuke must navigate this unfamiliar terrain while encountering iconic figures such as Oda Nobunaga and Toyotomi Hideyoshi. As he introduces modern concepts to these legendary warriors, Sasuke discovers a world that is both captivating and vastly different from the history books. Join Sasuke on this thrilling adventure filled with laughter, camaraderie, and a dash of romance in this exciting anime adaptation of the popular game 'Ik√©men Sengoku'.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
